channel.title: 🏢 College of Management of Technology, EPFL on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 College of Management of Technology, EPFL on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: QWO: Speeding Up Permutation-Based Causal Discovery in LiGAMs
item.description: QWO: a novel method dramatically speeds up permutation-based causal discovery in linear Gaussian models, enabling the analysis of larger datasets and advancing causal inference.
